22.eng-name: Oaths and Vows (Kitab Al-Aiman Wa Al-Nudhur)

hadiths.text: Narrated Buraidah:A woman came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and said: I gave a slave girl to my mother, but she died and left the salve-girl. He said: Your reward became certain for you, and she (the slave-girl) returned to you as inheritance. She said: She died and one month's fast was due from her. He (the narrator) then mentioned the tradition similar to the one mentioned by 'Amr b. 'Awn

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي قَضَاءِ النَّذْرِ عَنِ الْمَيِّتِ
chapter.eng-name: Fulfilling A Vow On Behalf Of One Who Had Died
